title: No route matches [GET] "/assets/status-sd8051fd480.png"
body:
I get this when loading sidekiq UI main page (`/sidekiq`)

Sidekiq 2.5.1
Rails 3.2.8

```
ActionController::RoutingError (No route matches [GET] "/assets/status-sd8051fd480.png"):
  actionpack (3.2.8) lib/action_dispatch/middleware/debug_exceptions.rb:21:in `call'

  rack (1.4.1) lib/rack/methodoverride.rb:21:in `call'
  rack (1.4.1) lib/rack/runtime.rb:17:in `call'
  activesupport (3.2.8) lib/active_support/cache/strategy/local_cache.rb:72:in `call'
  rack (1.4.1) lib/rack/lock.rb:15:in `call'
  actionpack (3.2.8) lib/action_dispatch/middleware/static.rb:62:in `call'

  railties (3.2.8) lib/rails/rack/log_tailer.rb:17:in `call'
  rack (1.4.1) lib/rack/handler/webrick.rb:59:in `service'
  /Users/sergio/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p286/lib/ruby/1.9.1/webrick/httpserver.rb:138:in `service'
  /Users/sergio/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p286/lib/ruby/1.9.1/webrick/httpserver.rb:94:in `run'
  /Users/sergio/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p286/lib/ruby/1.9.1/webrick/server.rb:191:in `block in start_thread'
```
